skill.name: Food Fighter
skill.description: Creates an Energy Guard which is equal to {{x}}% of max HP that takes DMG for 4 turn(s). Increase ATK by {{y}}% for 4 turn(s).

profile.description: The best dishes for the best party. If I can taste dished like this everytime, then maybe parties are not that bad.
profile.affiliation: Contestant of the Miss Aniweiss Final
profile.dislike: Playing around at the dinner table
profile.cherish: A normal, daily life with nothing much to do
rumors: Do you see the mountain of skewers over there? That petite lady finished all of those by herself. She really was like a bottomless pit.
If I had to choose the one person hiding the most powerful weapon in this party venue...

lines.script: What is it? I have a prior engagement...
I'll take you on... It'll help me work top an appetite before dinner.
...Who knew I would be fighting in this getup?
I'm heading back to the buffet.
It's a dish that goes with a party.
